content: While looking at the parallax problems for VR content creation from live situations, I truly think that Lytro is the ONLY way to make truly immersive VR content, and I applaud you for seeing that this is where light field technology should go. Some day, I hope to see consumer or prosumer gear which can do this. But I know that it just can’t. The 3D illusion is broken in normal 3D content the minute you move your head a bit. Light field solves the problem. I’m excited to see where this leads you.
